1.1 for the transport so you have otlp over http and ltlp over grpc
it currently supports the binary protobuf encoding and they're in the works uh
there's a plan to support also json encoding over http so you'll have json over otlp over http
um and it's agnostic so as you can see you can actually take the protofile and you can
